description: A pure expression of rugged Polo style, this trucker jacket combines hard-wearing faded denim and American-made hardware.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 24¼" front body length, a 23¾" back body length, an 18¾" shoulder, a 42¼" chest, and a 25½" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Point collar. Buttoned placket. American-made buttons.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Two chest buttoned pockets. Two front waist angled pockets. "Polo" label at the left chest pocket.
Adjustable buttoned tabs at the back waist.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
